attributes.action: We demand to know how many criminals out of the 5million immigrants have entered Britain unchecked
attributes.additional_details:
Fed up of the immigration crisis now affecting Britain? Sick to death of the lies, bureaucracy, and bunglings of The Home Office, UK Border Controls and European legislation in relation to mass immigration?

Ever thought that we should make people in this country fill the vacant positions instead of bringing foreigners in to do our dirty work?

Ever thought that you can't change policy?

Well now is your chance, together lets make the Government reveal EXACTLY how many out of the 5 million immigrants Thereasa May has quoted are likely to commit criminal acts. How many could rape, murder, attack, mug, fraudulently claim insurance, benefits etc etc against us, decent hard working people of Great Britain. Sign the e-petition and lets get our voices heard.
